state: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! First thing I need you to do is to go to the north. And then, go to the east. With that over with, try to head south. After that, make an effort to head east. And then, make an attempt to go north. Then, take a trip west. Then, try to venture south. Then, make an attempt to move south. Following that, take a trip south. That done, travel south. With that over with, head east. Then, move north. Once you accomplish that, attempt to venture north.
